p: Figure 1 compares three representative GC chromatographic terpene profiles of foliar (a), cortical (b) and xylem (c) tissues, and shows enantiomeric monoterpenes, namely (+)/(−)-α-pinene, (+)/(−)-β-pinene, (+)/(−)-limonene, (−)-linalool, (−)-bornylacetate and (−)-verbenone. All the 25 terpenes identified are also reported in Table S1 of the Supplementary Materials.
